document.masterDocTitle: Review of the genus Onychiurus Gervais, 1841 (Collembola: Onychiuridae) with description of a new cave species from Southern Spain

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of the genus Onychiurus Gervais, 1841 (Collembola: Onychiuridae) with description of a new cave species from Southern Spain

heading.emphasis:
Key to the world species of
Onychiurus

paragraph.keyLead:
- Abd. I–III with 3,3 , 3 dorsal pseudocelli (
obsiones
group sensu Kaprus’, 2008 ).................................... 9

10 Formula of parapseudocelli on Abd. sterna as 11100 ; Ratio length AS /inner edge of claw III 1.00– 1,27 .........
O. vtorovi

- Formula of parapseudocelli on Abd. sterna as 11101 ; Ratio length AS /inner edge of claw III 0.66–1.00...........
O. darii
11 Th. I with 6 + 6 dorsal chaetae; distal whorl on tibiotarsi with 7 chaetae.......................................... 12

- Th. I with 7 + 7 dorsal chaetae; distal whorl on tibiotarsi with 9 chaetae....................................
O. jaceki

- Sense organ of Ant. III with 5 guard chaetae.....................................................
O. sarmaticus

13 VT with 1 + 1 chaetae at base. Abd. V tergum with
a 3
as macrochaetae (
a 3
chaeta longer than
a 1
).............
O. obsiones

14 Abd. V tergum with
a 3
as macrochaetae (
a 3
chaeta longer than
a 1
); empodial appendage half as long as inner edge of claw............................................................................................
O. szeptyckii

- Abd. V tergum with
a 3
as microchaetae (
a 3
chaeta shorter than
a 1
); empodial appendage as long as inner edge of claw............................................................................................
O. orienteuropeus

17 Abd. I–II with 1 + 1 ventral pseudocelli. Empodial lamella present.....................................
O. nathanieli

- Abd. I–II with 2 + 2 ventral pseudocelli. Empodial lamella absent........................................
O. paoletti

24 Abd. I with 2 + 2 ventral pseudocelli...................................................
O. subambulans
(partim)

- Abd. II with 2 + 2 ventral pseudocelli.................................
O. ambulans sensu
Stach, 1934
&
Gisin, 1956

27 Abd. IV with 1 + 1 ventral pseudocelli.................................................
O. subambulans
(partim)

- Abd. I with 2 + 2 ventral pseudocelli..................................................
O. circulans
from Madeira

31 Formula of parapseudocelli on Abd. sterna as
101003
. Males with ventral organ.......................
O. rectospinatus

- Formula of parapseudocelli on Abd. sterna as
111003
. Males without ventral organ.........................
O. reluctus

32 Th. I–III without ventral pseudocelli..........................................................
O. dissimulans

- Avd. II with 2 + 2 ventral pseudocelli...............................
O. circulans
;
O. ambulans sensu Pomorski, 1998
